captions.text: did you know that if you have a SEGA Genesis
and you put in any S cartridge inside
maybe you could talk some sense
or maybe I could take this thing
and stick it on your head
and then I can use your head
City looks like a lot of fun
but you can't kick the man out of the motorcycle
it's time for a secret message
and then I account it high time
to get to sea as soon as I can.
I know Moby Dick quotes are exciting
and your opponent is now a horseshoe.
Sometimes you need to take risks in life.
Even when all of the odds
it looks like we have reached the boss
And that means its the end
